
```{r, include = FALSE}
if(is.null(input$fileALL)){
  files <- NULL
}else{
  inFile <- input$fileALL
  files <- inFile$name
  file.copy(inFile$datapath, paste0("temp/All/add/", inFile$name))
}
evalcheck <- !(is.null(files))
```


```{r, eval = evalcheck, results = 'asis'}
   files %>% l_ply(function(file){  
     cat('\\includepdf[pages = -]{', 'temp/All/add/',file, '}', sep = "")
     cat('')
   })
```
